name: By the Pool
description: Now that you have some login credentials for a hacking forum, why don't you put them to good use? You might have to use an appropriate DNS server, though.

tasks.name: Tool?
tasks.description: What file type did the hacker disguise the tool as?

tasks.name: Home Sweet Home
tasks.description: Where was the transaction confirmation image sent from? We are interested in comma-separated coordinates with 3 digits after the decimal point.
